@EU_Commission more trade more consuming more pollution more extinction

not in my name

@EU_Commission @DavidGHFrost when I purchase from @AmazonUK I receive an email, acknowledging my order. Then an email informing me it has been dispatched. At this point, the email INCLUDES a 'track your order' button. This allows me to follow my parcel from sender, via all depots
@EU_Commission @IBN_Berlin Including Ireland? Ireland is connected right now?
@EU_Commission Bubble-wrap and packaging films - nightmare for householders. Straws, cups, microbeads, etc - nightmare for the planet.
@EU_Commission #FucktheEU
@EU_Commission @eu_near @UN I will help if you give me money first 😉 Nothing comes for free

@EU_Commission @yanpal7 Better get Greek govt to fix massive IT failure that prevents many foreign residents getting ANY proof of vaccination. Social security no. that got them vaccinated cannot be recognised to provide proof of vaccination.

Ban non rechargable batteries

Ban inbox Charger, cables, remotes

Mandate

IR blaster, nFC, USB C in 100% mobiles

Thing some.simoler solutions too

@UNFCCC @ClimateReality @FCC @GSMA @CES @UNEP @UNEP_NAmerica @ClimateGroup

@EU_Commission why giving money to leaders like @PresidentBio when they are not transparent enough to allow institutions work independently to do proper audits? @EU_Commission should stop giving us monies but rather help us with sober leaders. You know the thieves in Africa.
@EU_Commission Great news for Plastic Free July
@EU_Commission 🌏

@EU_Commission Plastics are still cheapest way to produce plenty of objects. Charge their production and manufacturing could be a way.

Please don't take the whole responsability on citizens.

@EU_Commission Fishing nets are the main problem, we're being told.
@EU_Commission This is a bit crazy, we blame plastics but really we should blame people, plastic found on beaches is not a plastic fault, its irresponsible users...
@EU_Commission This is #oneStep but #notEnough

@EU_Commission I‘m ready to change my relationship with the EU.

But the EU is a really toxic person and does not want me to mind my own business.

@EU_Commission How about just banning the manufacture of such products?
Straws were made of  paper when I was a kid 🤔

@EU_Commission @pettet50 There is no planet B. 
Let's stop this disgusting crazy human reproduction. Reproduce just once or twice in a life time and only if you can provide all the human rights of the child.
@EU_Commission Only pussies use straws but fuck off anyway
@EU_Commission Did you ever taste a carton straw?🤮
@EU_Commission Don't usw straws, drink beer! 😘

@EU_Commission No such thing as an EU beach.

You know where you can stick those straws.

@EU_Commission @RethinkingCI Congratulations to @EU_Commission In my humble opinion what is needed to tackle single-use plastics is to ensure effective & sustainable collection system which will prevent the plastic waste getting to areas where they are NOT Needed. All hands MUST be on deck to #Recover ALL

@EU_Commission You fuckers already banned the use of single-use plastic items. How much more are you going to tout your horn for doing it? "Paper, cardboard and wood are just perfect" - for some uses, sure, for others plastic is superior and cheaper. Stop making life more expensive in Europe.
@EU_Commission What could define art better than this? Those who think Coca-Cola cover design is an art are wrong They end the future with ignorance

@EU_Commission Nice! I researched biodegradable polymers for sustainable packaging applications. I want to continue my studies at the University of Zaragoza. Sadly, I can't get my visa due to the restrictions of the Spanish Government. Please, help us, we need student visas to study in Spain.🇧🇷

@EU_Commission TELL NOW #CATALUNYA #BULGARIA #SPAIN & OTHER TO UNBLOCK MY #BOOKING & #FACEBOOK. THIS IS #GAY #TORTURE & #PERSECUTION! THIS IS A #ANTIGAY #CRIME! STOP NOW! I WANT TO LEAVE SPAIN! #LGBT #ILGA #EUROPEANPARLIAMENT #EUROPEAN #MEDITERRANEAN
@EU_Commission What nonsense the issuing a of “passport” to say you don’t have the flu. The EU is just another form of bureaucratic communism in the making, watch this space. 🐑🇨🇳🐑🇨🇳🐑🇨🇳

@EU_Commission ¡Ayúdenos! Todo el proceso de aplicación, aprobación, recopilación de documentos, expectativas y planificación exige mucha carga emocional ¡Necesitamos visas para los estudiantes, queremos estudiar! 🇧🇷🇪🇸
#EstudiarEsEsencial @estudiarBR_ESP
@EU_Commission Deal with your fishermen dumping plastics at sea.
@EU_Commission That's good and all but it feels pretty pointless when an ocean was literally on fire because of greedy corperations...

@EU_Commission @UN fuck you. companies are hands down the biggest polluters because they can legally get away with it. how about you guys stop fucking the little guy and start fucking the big guy. because we the little people are getting fed up. fed up little people eventually turn into a giant.
@EU_Commission What about the plastic bottles that contain water and refreshments?? You actually don't want to harm the business of the big companies that sell this kind of stuff, right?

@EU_Commission Lightweight plastic carrier bags have been banned across Eritrea as part of a major new campaign to clean up the countryside. The blue bags, used by shoppers all over the country until last week, are neither bio-degradable, nor strong enough to be used more than once.Apr 15, 2002
@EU_Commission @EU_ENV @UN I say we act now to prevent Carbon Trading from funding the Political Class grifters.
@EU_Commission Good start.
@EU_Commission Thank you so much for making us poorer. Its why you exist: to make European citizen's lives a little worse everyday.
@EU_Commission Awesome.🐬
@EU_Commission So what about the plastic bottles that contain water or refreshments?? You probably don't want to harm the business of the big companies who are your boss???

@EU_Commission Yes plastic is bad, very bad... But ban of plastic will make us use much more woods which is not green solution if we are not using some 1 year sorts.... Taking down oaks etc is not renewable

@EU_Commission Thank you for doing this big step forward. The biggest reason for plastic polluter is industrial fishing. Will you help #EU citzen to understand they don't need sea food but only #plantbased omega to be healthy?
@EU_Commission Let’s make the fishies happy 🐠!
@EU_Commission @UN Keeping clean is a part of faith.
@EU_Commission You should address the problem of overfishing now, the dwindling stocks of certain species should have us all worried but we can do more.
@EU_Commission @UN to use the smurfette icon of beauty for such a thankless job 😡. Who's kidding #EU . Can do better, must do better #ClimateActionNow #NextGenerationEU
